subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Most minor league teams have promotions — from Thunderstix Night to Food Fling — but the Rox, an independent franchise, seem to have a knack for devising stunts that resonate nationally.
snippet: Most minor league teams have promotions — from Thunderstix Night to Food Fling — but the Rox, an independent franchise, seem to have a knack for devising stunts that resonate nationally.
